document.full_text: al qaeda leader osama bin laden was buried at sea from the deck of a u.s. aircraft carrier in the north arabian sea after being washed according to islamic custom and receiving a religious funeral, a u.s. defense official said on monday.
document.title: bin laden burial followed islamic custom: official
lines_and_colors: al qaeda leader osama bin laden was buried at sea from the deck of a u.s. aircraft carrier in the north arabian sea after being washed according to islamic custom and receiving a religious funeral, a u.s. defense official said on monday.
